application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: Our client intends to remove the following trees:Remove T4 - 5.5m tall Viburnum in the front gardenRemove T5 - 6m tall Bay Laurel in the front gardenRemove T9 - 4.5m tall Strawberry tree in the rear gardenRemove T10 - 5m tall Juniper in the rear gardenRemove T11 - 13m tall Monterey Cypress in the rear gardenRemove T12 - 12m tall Monterey Cypress in the rear gardenRemove T13 - T13 Western Red Cedar in the rear garden (in a poor structural and physiological condition, very low vigour).Remove T14 - 10m tall Lawson Cypress in the rear gardenRemove T17 - 8m tall Lawson Cypress in the rear gardenRemove T19 - 1mm tall Sycamore in the rear gardenRemove T20 - 4m tall Apple in the rear gardenOur client also wishes to undertake the following tree pruning works:T6 (Bay tree in the front garden) - Reduce height from 6m down to 4m and lightly trim foliage by up to 10cm to shape the tree.G15 (two Yew trees in the rear garden) - Reduce height from 7m down to 5m and prune canopies by up to 30cm to tidy and shape the trees.T16 (Monterey Cypress in the rear garden) - Reduce height from 11m down to 7m. The tree has major included bark and tight union at stem junction.T18 (Monterey Cypress in the rear garden) - Reduce height from 10m to 8m and crown lift to 2.5m.T21 (5m tall Elder in the rear garden) - Reduce its east and west canopy to 2m & remove deadwood.T22 (5m tall Elder in the rear garden) - Reduce its north, east and west canopy to 2m.T23 (Lawson Cypress in the rear garden) - Reduce height from 7m down to 5m (significant included bark at stem junction).
